markdownSource: Welcome to Encapsule Project - Libraries & tools for building Node.js/HTML5 apps & services with declarative models & reusable JavaScript plug-ins.
This website is a demonstration of a new application server and REST framework codenamed
**[Holism](/docs/holism)** build on top of the [Node.js](https://nodejs.org) [HTTP API](https://nodejs.org/api/http.html).
Holism implements a plug-in architecture that routes HTTP requests through a series of developer-defined
[ARCcore.filter](/docs/ARCcore/filter) objects that implement application-specific functions. Filter objects use
JSON-encoded message schemas called [filter specifications](/docs/ARCcore/filter/specs) to define API contracts
that are enforced generically by the run-time.
Current builds of this application leverage Holism [services](/docs/holism/services) (filter plug-ins) that
manage HTML document rendering via [Facebook's React](https://facebook.github.io/react/) library ,
user profile and session management via [RedisLab's](https://redislabs.com/) [Redis](https://redis.io) noSQL store,
and an evolving content management system based on [ARCcore.graph](/docs/ARCcore/graph).
The [Holism](/docs/holism) application server project started in late November, 2016 and become minimally viable
In early March, 2017 Encapsule.io (this site) was converted to a Holism-derived application replacing
Current work is focused on completing the [developer documentation](/docs), and preparing the Holism (server),
Holistic (re-usable plug-in features), and ARCcore (data modeling and processing runtime) packages for v1 release.
